name: The Fastest RPG Ever
description:
Ever wanted to finish a game really fast ?

This is it ! Let's play a very condensed game which you won't forget.

The game was originaly made in 2010 with Processing. This remake use same assets and was made with Unity.

The main idea was to ask the player what's the most important in an adventure game : finish it (the fast way), or explore it (the slow way) ?

There's a lot of way for the character to die. One gameplay would be to discover them all.
